contributes.commands0.title: git add: File in Active Editor
contributes.commands1.title: git add: -u (Changes in Tracked Files)
contributes.commands2.title: git add: Selected Lines or Cursor Line
config.git-add-with-git-add.showExplorer: Display command in Explorer context menu
config.git-add-with-git-add.dialogOnWork: VSCode treats commands triggered from the Explorer's empty area as targeting the entire workspace folder, ignoring the visually selected file. Enable this setting to show a warning dialog for such actions. Default is ON.
config.git-add-with-git-add.dialogOnExec: Display a warning dialog when executing git restore
